property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.queues
property.description: The queues at the root level (root is the root queue).

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.default.user-limit-factor
property.description: Default queue user limit a percentage from 0.0 to 1.0.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.default.maximum-capacity
property.description: The maximum capacity of the default queue.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.default.state
property.description: The state of the default queue. State can be one of RUNNING or STOPPED.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.default.acl_submit_applications
property.description: The ACL of who can submit jobs to the default queue.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.default.acl_administer_queue
property.description: The ACL of who can administer jobs on the default queue.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.node-locality-delay
property.description: Number of missed scheduling opportunities after which the CapacityScheduler attempts to schedule rack-local containers.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.queue-mappings
property.description: A list of mappings that will be used to assign jobs to queues.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.queue-mappings-override.enable
property.description: If a queue mapping is present, will it override the value specified by the user?
